contentList.content: Silver Wyrmling Staff
The cold emanating from this staff seems to suck all heat from the air, never once chilling the dark wood.
Ruby Wyrmling Staff
The force resonating through this staff seems to vibrate the air, never once breaking the dark wood.
Bronze Wyrmling Staff
The lightning charging this staff seems to electrify the air, never once shocking the dark wood.
Diamond Wyrmling Staff
The radiance emitting from this staff seems to light up the air, never once brightening the dark wood.
Emerald Wyrmling Staff
The necrosis spreading through this staff seems to descrate the air, never once rotting the dark wood.
Amethyst Wyrmling Staff
The psychosis permeating this staff seems to travel through thin air, never once weakening the dark wood.
Copper Wyrmling Staff
The acid coating this staff seems to make the air around it acrid, never once eroding the dark wood.
Green Wyrmling Staff
The poison dripping from this staff seems to suffuse the air, never once enfusing the dark wood.
Quickened Fire Bolt
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_FireBolt_Staff">Fire Bolt</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Ray of Frost
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_RayOfFrost_Staff">Ray of Frost</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Eldritch Blast
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_EldritchBlast_Staff">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Shocking Grasp
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_ShockingGrasp_Staff">Shocking Grasp</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Sacred Flame
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_SacredFlame_Staff">Sacred Flame</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Bone Chill
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_ChillTouch_Staff">Bone Chill</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Vicious Mockery
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_ViciousMockery_Staff">Vicious Mockery</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Acid Splash
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_AcidSplash_Staff">Acid Splash</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Quickened Poison Spray
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_PoisonSpray_Staff">Poison Spray</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
